DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to clear the Safety and Necessity of the Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) in the Presence of CIEDs(Cardiovascular Implantable Electronic Devices).
DOC.brief_title: Registry Study of Clinical Application of MRI Compatible CIED
DOC.criteria: 1. Exclusion criteria Have other medical implants that may interact with MRI, e.g. abandoned pacemaker/ICD leads, lead extensions, mechanical valves, other active medical devices, nonMRI compatible devices Life expectancy less than 2 years Pregnant and/or breatfeeding females or females who intend to become pregnant in next two years Patient is currently participating in another study In the investigator's opinion patient will not be able to comply with the followup requirements
